name: Gravedigger: Escape From Death (A Necromancy TTRPG)
name_original: Gravedigger: Escape From Death (A Necromancy TTRPG)
description:
You are a Necromancer, and you are Dead.

You do not want to be Dead.

Your skeletal body lies on the outskirts of the deadly forest that contains the THORNHEART.

Make your way to the center, vying for power against your dead comrades,

in a search for the HEART that will give you LIFE!

(This is a Work In Progress, the graphical assets have not yet been made. HOWEVER, they can be easily made with paper and pencil, plus colored pencils or markers for the tokens! The map is a simple square with four paths towards the middle, as described in the document.)
